pkgmetadata.longdescription: Collection of 'shiny' Apps for Tree Breeding Analysis // A collection of interactive 'shiny' applications for performing comprehensive analyses in the field of tree breeding and genetics. The package is designed to assist users in visualizing and interpreting experimental data through a user- friendly interface. Each application is launched via a simple function, and users can upload data in 'Excel' format for analysis. For more information, refer to Singh, R.K. and Chaudhary, B.D. (1977, ISBN:9788176633079).
